body:
SELECT   a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value as gender,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0008]/value as birthdate
        FROM EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c
  CONTAINS (OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.basic_demographic.v1])
            LIMIT 1
        ORDER BY c /context/start_time/ value DESC
